title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 110.4 - Rulings to be made available to the public
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 110.4 - Rulings to be made available to the public

State Regulations

Petitions, and declaratory rulings responding thereto, shall be made available to the public. Written requests for copies of petitions
or rulings should be sent to the address listed in section
110.2
(b) of this

Procedure. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
110.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
